sentences.maori: I tētahi wā, i reira tētahi kotiro iti ko te ingoa ko Little Red Riding Hood.
sentences.english: Once upon a time, there was a little girl named Little Red Riding Hood.

sentences.maori: I tētahi wā, i reira tētahi kotiro iti ko te ingoa ko Cinderella.
